name: [+18]Never Back Down
description:
The main character is an 18 yo boy who just got a full-ride scholarship into college, but college is the last thing he's worried about because of family issues going on. He's spending most of his summer outside or in front of his PC. Can you lead him through college and give him a college experience filled with women or will he still be the same old virgin boy Kevin (MC), it's all up to you to decide his fate, and remember, no matter what happens, Never Back Down.

My Patreon page.
